org.konelabs.stroll.tetris
Class PieceTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.konelabs.stroll.tetris.PieceTemplate

public class PieceTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a template piece that is used to create a Tetris piece. Pieces must have unique id's

Author:
Keldon
